%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW personnelsubarea_grouped

    AS

SELECT 
    PSubarea AS PersonnelSubAreaCode,
    Personnel_Subarea AS Description

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr
WHERE PSubarea IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY PSubarea, Personnel_Subarea;

# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (sap hr) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.personnelsubarea_dim)
- **New Data:** where a PA in the source does not exist as an PersonnelSubAreaCode in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on PA in source and PersonnelSubAreaCode in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an PersonnelSubAreaCode in the target exists but the same PA doesn't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View personnel_sub_area_dim_new is created

%%sql
-- Build personnelarea_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW personnelsubarea_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT 
    CASE
        WHEN T1.PersonnelSubAreaCode IS NULL
        THEN T7.PersonnelSubAreaID
        ELSE NULL
    END as PersonnelSubAreaID, -- surrogate key
    T1.PersonnelSubAreaCode, -- source system id
    T1.Description, 
    T2.SourceSystemID as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.PersonnelSubAreaCode,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Description,'.'))) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.PersonnelSubAreaCode = T7.PersonnelSubAreaCode AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.PersonnelSubAreaCode,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Description,'.'))) <> T7.RowID    -- same employee, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T7.PersonnelSubAreaCode IS NULL -- new employee
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END as NewData,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.PersonnelSubAreaCode IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END AS  DeletedData, 
    T7.IsActive as HistoricIsActive

FROM personnelsubarea_grouped T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description and T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_personnel_sub_area_dim T7 ON T1.PersonnelSubAreaCode = T7.PersonnelSubAreaCode AND T7.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
    (
        
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
                WHEN T1.PersonnelSubAreaCode = T7.PersonnelSubAreaCode AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.PersonnelSubAreaCode,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Description,'.'))) <> T7.RowID    -- same employee, changed data
                THEN 'Y'
                WHEN T7.PersonnelSubAreaCode IS NULL -- new employee
                THEN 'Y'
                ELSE 'N'
            END  = 'Y' ) OR
        
        -- flags deleted data
        ( CASE
                WHEN T1.PersonnelSubAreaCode IS NULL
                THEN 'Y'
                ELSE 'N'
            END = 'Y' )
    )
;

# Run tests to check integrity of data by numbers
- This script checks for the total number of current codes in the harmonised table, and compare against the numbers for new data to be added and data to be set as inactive.
- **Changes tracking:** where it checks the data against active records in harmonised and compares with records to add and records to be set as inactive.
- **Changes tolerance levels:** if the total ammount to be added and deleted surpasses the tolerance limit, it will interrupt the proces of loading the data

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **personnelarea_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View personnelarea_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Creating new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW personnelsubarea_dim_changed_rows

    AS

SELECT 
    PersonnelSubAreaID,
    PersonnelSubAreaCode,
    Description, 
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM personnelsubarea_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

SELECT
    PersonnelSubAreaID,
    PersonnelSubAreaCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_personnel_sub_area_dim
WHERE PersonnelSubAreaCode IN (SELECT PersonnelSubAreaCode FROM personnelsubarea_dim_new WHERE PersonnelSubAreaID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

# View personnelsubarea_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. PA from SAPHR), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.personnelsubarea_dim is updated

%%sql

-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.hr_personnel_sub_area_dim AS Target
USING personnelsubarea_dim_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.PersonnelSubAreaID = Target.PersonnelSubAreaID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = date_sub(current_timestamp,1),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.personnelsubarea_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new PersonnelSubAreaID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.hr_personnel_sub_area_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY PersonnelSubAreaID NULLS LAST) AS PersonnelSubAreaID,
    PersonnelSubAreaCode,
    Description, 
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_personnel_sub_area_dim;
